name: Mannequin House
description:
Mannequin House is a horror game where you collect paintings while running away from the Mannequins that come your way.

Recommended for:
people who want to be scared
People who want to be surprised
People who are tired of playing errand games
A broadcaster with a reputation for good reactions

story:
The setting is the house of a wealthy mannequin designer on an island.
According to rumors, the owner of the house has a hobby of collecting high-quality paintings.
The owner is not home today. This is your chance to steal the painting.

Features:
This game contains many scary scenes.
Collect paintings while running away from the Mannequins that attacks you.

※This game has a single ending.

All Actor games can be distributed without permission,
We want as many people as possible to know about it and as many people as possible to enjoy it.
When distributing the product, please refer to our store page.
